00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_CONSTRUCTOR_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_DETAIL_FUNCTOR_CONSTRUCTOR_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat_from_to.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_params.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_binary_params.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/range/reference.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_cv.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/mpl/always.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/type_traits/container/value.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/limit_arity.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/functor/crtp_unary_and_up.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost{
00023 namespace assign{
00024 namespace v2{
00025 namespace functor_aux{
00026 
00027         template<typename T>
00028         class constructor : public functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00029         functor_aux::constructor<T>,
00030         boost::mpl::always<T>
00031     >
00032         {
00033                 typedef functor_aux::constructor<T> this_;
00034         typedef boost::mpl::always<T> meta_result_;
00035         typedef functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<this_, meta_result_> super_;
00036 
00037         public:
00038 
00039                 constructor(){}
00040 
00041                 T operator()()const{ return T(); }
00042 
00043                 using super_::operator();
00044 
00045 #define MACRO(z,N,data) \
00046     template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N,typename T)> \
00047     T impl( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, &_) )const{ \
00048         return T( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N,_) ); \
00049     } \
00050 
00051 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00052         1,
00053     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00054     MACRO,
00055     ~
00056 )
00057 #undef MACRO
00058 
00059         };
00060 
00061         template<typename V>
00062     struct deduce_constructor
00063     {
00064         typedef typename container_type_traits::value<V>::type value_;
00065         typedef functor_aux::constructor<value_> type;
00066         static type call(){ return functor_aux::constructor<value_>(); }
00067     };
00068 
00069 
00070 }// functor_aux
00071 namespace result_of{
00072 
00073         template<typename T>
00074         struct constructor
00075     {
00076         typedef functor_aux::constructor<T> type;
00077     };
00078 
00079 }// result_of
00080 
00081         template<typename T>
00082         typename result_of::constructor<T>::type
00083     constructor()
00084     {
00085         typedef typename result_of::constructor<T>::type result_;
00086         return result_();
00087     }
00088 
00089 }// v2
00090 }// assign
00091 }// boost
00092 
00093 #endif
